articles.author: Jesus Jiménez
articles.title: Pacific Northwest Braces For Another Heat Wave - The New York Times
articles.description: With nearly 200 million Americans under heat alerts this week, we’re on top of the latest extreme weather. Follow here for news on heat waves, wildfires, tropical storms and more.
articles.content: This heat wave is not as hot as the late June one, the Weather Service said in a forecast. However, this doesnt mean we can let our guard down as temperatures in the 90s to near 100 are still signifi… [+1278 chars]

articles.title: New Lineage of Carnivorous Plants Discovered | Biology - Sci-News.com
articles.description: The newly-identified lineage of carnivorous plants is represented by the western false asphodel (Triantha occidentalis), a species of flowering plant from North America.
articles.content: The newly-identified lineage of carnivorous plants is represented by the western false asphodel (Triantha occidentalis), a species of flowering plant from North America; its trap is unique among carn… [+3699 chars]

articles.author: Allison Bray
articles.title: New York's new Governor Kathy Hochul has strong Irish roots - Independent.ie
articles.description: New York’s new Governor Kathy Hochul is set to make history as the first ever female Governor of New York and the second Irish American to hold the post following the resignation today of Andrew Cuomo following a string of sexual misconduct allegations.
articles.content: New Yorks new Governor Kathy Hochul is set to make history as the first ever female Governor of New York and the second Irish American to hold the post following the resignation today of Andrew Cuomo… [+5009 chars]
